item.title: 苹果将分析设备上的用户数据以加强人工智能技术
item.description: 苹果公司将开始分析客户设备上的数据，以改进其人工智能平台，此举旨在保护用户信息，同时帮助其赶上人工智能竞争对手。【原文：Apple Inc. will begin analyzing data on customers’ devices in a bid to improve its artificial intelligence platform, a move designed to safeguard user information while still helping it catch up with AI rivals.】

item.title: 摩根大通囤积现金者在债券市场混乱中出手
item.description: 摩根资产管理公司（J.P. Morgan Asset Management）的债券投资组合经理比尔-艾根（Bill Eigen）过去三年来一直囤积现金，随着信贷市场出现裂痕，他终于开始至少部署其中的一部分资金。【原文：Bill Eigen, a bond portfolio manager at J.P. Morgan Asset Management who’s been hoarding cash for the past three years, has finally started deploying at least some of those funds as the credit market shows signs of cracks.】

item.title: 关税引发的市场动荡使芝加哥养老金损失 10 亿美元
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税政策引发的市场崩溃中，芝加哥的四个养老基金估计损失了近 10 亿美元，这对该市的退休计划是一个打击，而该市的退休计划是美国所有大城市中资金最少的。【原文：Four Chicago pension funds are estimated to have lost nearly $1 billion amid the market rout set off by President Donald Trump’s tariff policies, a blow to the city’s retirement programs that are among the least funded of all major US cities.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的 "星链 "获得在莱索托运营的许可
item.description: 莱索托向埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司颁发了在这个南部非洲山区小国运营卫星网络的许可证。【原文：Lesotho granted a license to Elon Musk’s Starlink to operate its satellite network in the tiny southern African mountain kingdom.】

item.title: 关税有可能提高建筑成本和公共汽车买家的要求
item.description: Van Eck Associates Corp. 的塔玛拉-洛温（Tamara Lowin）表示，关税将使州和地方政府的建设计划复杂化，投资者将寻求更多补偿，以应对不确定性。【原文：Tariffs are going to complicate state and local governments’ construction plans, and investors will be looking for more compensation to account for the uncertainty, according to Tamara Lowin of Van Eck Associates Corp.】

item.title: Webull 在 SPAC 合并后的第二个交易日股价大涨 441
item.description: Webull Corp. 上周与一家空头支票公司合并上市后，周一股价上涨了五倍多。【原文：Webull Corp. shares more than quintupled on Monday after the online brokerage went public last week by merging with a blank-check vehicle.】

item.title: 富国银行聘请美国银行的 MacDonald 负责工业 ECM 银行业务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. has hired Christie MacDonald as a managing director in equity capital markets banking, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在特朗普的关税计划下，Etsy 的工匠和购物者将遭受痛苦
item.description: 帕姆-杜西（Pam Duthie）是一位 51 岁的英国手工艺人，她的生意主要是向美国人出售一种独特的方式，以记录他们对毛茸茸朋友的爱。【原文：Pam Duthie, a 51-year-old UK-based artisan, built her business selling Americans a unique way to capture their love of their furry friends.】

item.title: 杠杆 ETF 交易者在大筹码押注后经历波动之旅
item.description: 这种平反的感觉并没有持续太久。【原文：The sense of vindication didn’t last long.】

item.title: 白桥考虑出售补充剂制造商 Named Group
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利私募股权公司 White Bridge Investments 正在探索出售食品补充剂公司 Named Group，该公司的估值可能高达 8 亿欧元（约合 9.07 亿美元）。【原文：Italian private equity firm White Bridge Investments is exploring a sale of food-supplements firm Named Group, which could be valued at as much as €800 million ($907 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 比索下跌 12%，米莱告诉阿根廷农民立即出售大豆
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统鼓励阿根廷潘帕斯地区的农民抓住周一的时机，在放松货币管制后立即出售大豆，这使得比索在官方市场上贬值了约 12%。【原文：President Javier Milei encouraged farmers on Argentina’s Pampas to seize the moment Monday and sell their soybeans now after he eased currency controls, which weakened the peso by about 12% on official markets.】

item.title: 旗舰基金股价暴跌，Armistice 三月亏损 19
item.description: Armistice Capital 上个月亏损了近 19%，这是该对冲基金旗舰资金池自十多年前推出以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Armistice Capital lost almost 19% last month, the biggest decline for the hedge fund’s flagship money pool since its launch more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔预计关税对通胀的影响是暂时的
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）就唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策可能如何影响美国经济提出了两种设想，但他表示，这两种设想对通胀的影响可能都是暂时的。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller laid out two scenarios for how President Donald Trump’s trade policy could affect the US economy, but said the inflationary impact of either would likely be temporary.】

item.title: 南非 Transnet 公司与最大工会之间的薪酬谈判失败
item.description: 南非国有港口和货运铁路公司最大的工会在工资谈判破裂后威胁要采取罢工行动。【原文：South Africa’s state-owned ports and freight rail company’s biggest union threatened strike action after wage talks collapsed.】

item.title: 障碍重重的 IPO日程表使交易复兴难以规划
item.description: 华尔街的银行家们正在敦促那些寻求在美国市场进行首次公开募股的公司保持耐心，让贸易战中的动荡得以平息。即使事态平息下来，他们仍要面对日程表上的一大堆麻烦。【原文：Wall Street bankers are urging companies seeking to IPO on US markets to have patience and let volatility play out amid the trade war. Even if things calm down, they still have to contend with a calendar packed with headaches.】

item.title: 新泽西州装满铜的仓库显示特朗普关税风险
item.description: E.W.Berger&Bro公司的老板杰伊-里奇曼（Jay Richman）一直在大量采购铜制冷热水管道部件，以应对美国可能征收的进口关税；他的仓库里堆满了用红色金属制造的额外紧固件、管件和管材。【原文：Jay Richman, the owner of E.W. Berger & Bro, has been loading up on copper plumbing parts to get ahead of possible US import tariffs — filling his warehouse with extra fasteners, fittings and tubing made from the red metal.】

item.title: 法国农业信贷银行在联合信贷银行竞购中将 BPM 股份增至 19.8
item.description: 根据周一提交的一份监管文件，法国农业信贷银行（Credit Agricole SA）已将其在 Banco BPM SpA 的持股比例提高到 19.8%，因为这家意大利银行正面临竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）主动提出的收购要约。【原文：Credit Agricole SA has lifted its stake in Banco BPM SpA to 19.8%, according to a regulatory filing on Monday, as the Italian bank is facing an unsolicited takeover bid from rival UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: Centrica 不再为下个冬季重新充装英国天然气储气库
item.description: Centrica Plc 公司尚未开始为英国北海最大的天然气储存设施加气，这可能导致英国明年冬季没有天然气储备。【原文：Centrica Plc hasn’t started refilling the UK’s biggest gas storage facility in the North Sea, potentially leaving the nation without reserves for next winter.】

item.title: 马阿拉歌晚宴会让西方失去人工智能的领先地位吗？
item.description:
英伟达首席执行官似乎说服了特朗普，让其继续向中国出售宝贵的人工智能芯片。这可能会让美国和欧洲处于不利地位。【原文：

Nvidia’s CEO appears to have convinced Trump to let it keep selling valuable AI chips to China. That could put the US and Europe on the back foot.   

】

item.title: 华尔街交易盛宴在各公司创下纪录后继续进行
item.description: 华尔街最大的股票交易商刚刚创造了有史以来最好的季度业绩。而这还是在唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战让股市和债市变得更加疯狂之前。【原文：Wall Street’s biggest stock traders just delivered their best quarter ever. And that was before President Donald Trump’s trade war made stock and bond markets even wilder.】

item.title: CLO 市场即将冻结，美国杠杆贷款风险上升
item.description: 杠杆贷款的最大买家正被挤到一边，这将使风险较高的公司更难进入 1.4 万亿美元的此类债务市场。【原文：The biggest buyers of leveraged loans are getting pushed to the sidelines, which is set to make it harder for riskier companies to tap the $1.4 trillion market for such debt.】

item.title: 加拿大帝国商业银行（CIBC）称加拿大人口增长可能高于预期
item.description: 加拿大帝国商业银行（Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce）的一位经济学家说，加拿大新的移民限制措施减缓了人口增长，但政府对未来两年人口增长接近零的预测很可能 "偏离了目标"。【原文：Canada’s new immigration curbs have slowed increases in population, but government projections of near-zero growth over the next two years are likely “off the mark,” said an economist with Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce.】

item.title: StoneX 以 9 亿美元收购芝加哥经纪公司 R.J. O'Brien
item.description: 总部位于纽约的金融服务公司 StoneX 集团公司同意以 9 亿美元的价格收购 R.J. O'Brien & Associates，以扩大全球衍生品业务。【原文：StoneX Group Inc., the New York-based financial services company, agreed to buy R.J. O’Brien & Associates in a $900 million deal to bulk up in global derivatives.】

item.title: 关税缓和提振股市，国债止住五日跌势
item.description: 美国暂时豁免部分科技产品的关税后，股市上扬，国债上涨，结束了五天来推动 10 年期国债收益率创二十多年来最大涨幅的大跌。【原文：Treasuries gained, snapping a five-day selloff that drove 10-year yields up by the most in over two decades, as stocks advanced after the US temporarily exempted some tech products from its tariffs.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示近期物价上涨，就业前景黯淡
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行的一项月度调查显示，美国消费者认为未来一年的通胀率将上升，并且对未来的就业前景越来越焦虑。【原文：American consumers see higher inflation in the year ahead and are growing more anxious about their future jobs prospects, according to a monthly survey from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York.】

item.title: Scope Ratings称，金融危机是美国贸易战的一种情形
item.description: 范围评级公司（Scope Ratings）称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战可能已经造成了持续的经济损失，并仍有可能导致金融危机。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade war may have already inflicted persisting economic damage and could still lead to a financial crisis, according to Scope Ratings.】

item.title: ADM 退出中国国内农作物贸易，全球裁员再添一员
item.description: 全球最大的农作物贸易商之一 Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.公司正在收缩其在中国的业务，这是继利润下滑和会计丑闻之后全公司重组努力的一部分。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co., one of the world’s largest crop traders, is shrinking its operations in China as part of a company-wide restructuring effort following a downturn in profits and a bruising accounting scandal.】

item.title: IDC 称苹果为应对关税将 iPhone 出货量提高 10
item.description: 根据行业跟踪机构 IDC 的数据，苹果公司第一季度的 iPhone 出货量激增 10%，这是苹果公司为加快交付速度和避免对中国征收关税所做努力的一部分。【原文：Apple Inc.’s iPhone unit shipments surged 10% in the first quarter as part of an effort to accelerate deliveries and avoid expected tariffs on China, according to industry tracker IDC.】

item.title: 房利美将特朗普的重要盟友马利克纳入董事会，普尔特说
item.description: 联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）在 X 网站上发表文章称，1789 Capital 的联合创始人奥米德-马利克（Omeed Malik）将加入抵押贷款巨头房利美的董事会。【原文：Omeed Malik, a co-founder of 1789 Capital, is joining the board of mortgage giant Fannie Mae, Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte said in a post on X.】

item.title: 英伟达称将在美国建造高达 5000 亿美元的人工智能设备
item.description: 在人工智能模型芯片领域占据主导地位的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the dominant player in chips for AI models, said it will produce as much as half a trillion dollars’ worth of AI infrastructure in the US over the next four years through manufacturing partnerships.】
